text:
is a mountain in Japan. It is 50 km from the center of Tokyo. It is in Meiji no Mori Takao Quasi-National Park.
In 1927, Mount Takao was named one of the 100 Landscapes of Japan which best showed Japan and its culture in the Shōwa period.
Geography.
The city of Hachiōji, Tokyo is at the base of Mount Takao.
Mount Takao is above sea level.

annotations.surface_form: Meiji no Mori Takao Quasi-National Park
